languages.text: {n}Ульфар улыбается, но улыбка эта принадлежит покойницкому черепу.{/n} "Уйду так далеко, как смогу. Заберусь в темные дали, в самое логово скверны, а уж там... Там я закончу свою охоту. И начнет охоту Зверь. Не летай за мной, эттфатер. Не риску".

{n}Ulfar smiles, but it is a smile that belongs on a dead man's skull.{/n} "I will go as far as I can. Plunge into the darkest depths, into the lair of evil itself, and then... That is where my hunt will end so the hunt of the Beast can start. Do not follow me, Aett-Vater. Do not risk it."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар улыбается, но улыбка эта принадлежит покойницкому черепу.{/n} "Уйду так далеко, как смогу. Заберусь в темные дали, в самое логово скверны, а уж там... Там я закончу свою охоту. И начнет охоту Зверь. Не летай за мной, эттфатер. Не риску".

languages.text: {n}乌尔法微笑着，但那微笑看起来就像死人的笑容一样。{/n}“我会尽我所能，冲入黑暗的深处，闯入邪恶的巢穴，在那里……我的狩猎会结束，而野兽的狩猎会开始。不要跟着我，狼领。不要冒这个险。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles, but it is a smile that belongs on a dead man's skull.{/n} "I will go as far as I can. Plunge into the darkest depths, into the lair of evil itself, and then... That is where my hunt will end so the hunt of the Beast can start. Do not follow me, Aett-Vater. Do not risk it."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法微笑着，但那微笑看起来就像死人的笑容一样。{/n}“我会尽我所能，冲入黑暗的深处，闯入邪恶的巢穴，在那里……我的狩猎会结束，而野兽的狩猎会开始。不要跟着我，狼领。不要冒这个险。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar sonríe con la alegría de un hombre muerto.{/n} «Iré tan lejos como pueda. Me arrojaré a las profundidades más oscuras, al corazón del mismo mal, y después... allí acabará mi cacería y comenzará la cacería de la Bestia. No me siga, Aett-Vater. No se arriesgue».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles, but it is a smile that belongs on a dead man's skull.{/n} "I will go as far as I can. Plunge into the darkest depths, into the lair of evil itself, and then... That is where my hunt will end so the hunt of the Beast can start. Do not follow me, Aett-Vater. Do not risk it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar sonríe con la alegría de un hombre muerto.{/n} «Iré tan lejos como pueda. Me arrojaré a las profundidades más oscuras, al corazón del mismo mal, y después... allí acabará mi cacería y comenzará la cacería de la Bestia. No me siga, Aett-Vater. No se arriesgue».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは微笑んだが、それは死人の頭部に浮かぶ微笑みだった。{/n}「行けるところまで行ってみることにしよう。闇の奥底へ、悪そのものの巣窟へとな。そして...そこで俺の狩りは終わり、野獣の狩りが始まるんだ。アエット＝ヴァテル、俺について来るな。危険を冒すじゃない」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles, but it is a smile that belongs on a dead man's skull.{/n} "I will go as far as I can. Plunge into the darkest depths, into the lair of evil itself, and then... That is where my hunt will end so the hunt of the Beast can start. Do not follow me, Aett-Vater. Do not risk it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは微笑んだが、それは死人の頭部に浮かぶ微笑みだった。{/n}「行けるところまで行ってみることにしよう。闇の奥底へ、悪そのものの巣窟へとな。そして...そこで俺の狩りは終わり、野獣の狩りが始まるんだ。アエット＝ヴァテル、俺について来るな。危険を冒すじゃない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar grinst, doch es ist ein Grinsen, das auf den Schädel eines Toten gehört.{/n} "Ich gehe, so weit ich kann. Tauche in die dunkelsten Tiefen hinab, in den Hort des Bösen selbst, und dann ... Dann wird meine Jagd dort enden, damit die Jagd der Bestie beginnen kann. Folgt mir nicht, Aett-Vater. Riskiert es nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles, but it is a smile that belongs on a dead man's skull.{/n} "I will go as far as I can. Plunge into the darkest depths, into the lair of evil itself, and then... That is where my hunt will end so the hunt of the Beast can start. Do not follow me, Aett-Vater. Do not risk it."

Tauche in die dunkelsten Tiefen hinab, in den Hort des Bösen selbst, und dann ... Dann wird meine Jagd dort enden, damit die Jagd der Bestie beginnen kann. Folgt mir nicht, Aett-Vater. Riskiert es nicht."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar sourit, mais son rictus ressemble à s'y méprendre à celui d'un cadavre.{/n} « J'irai aussi loin que possible. Je plongerai la tête la première dans les plus noires profondeurs, jusque dans la tanière du mal en personne, et alors... c'est là que ma chasse prendra fin pour laisser place à la traque de la Bête. Où que j'aille, je vous conjure de ne pas me suivre, aett-vater, c'est trop risqué. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles, but it is a smile that belongs on a dead man's skull.{/n} "I will go as far as I can. Plunge into the darkest depths, into the lair of evil itself, and then... That is where my hunt will end so the hunt of the Beast can start. Do not follow me, Aett-Vater. Do not risk it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar sourit, mais son rictus ressemble à s'y méprendre à celui d'un cadavre.{/n} « J'irai aussi loin que possible. Je plongerai la tête la première dans les plus noires profondeurs, jusque dans la tanière du mal en personne, et alors... c'est là que ma chasse prendra fin pour laisser place à la traque de la Bête. Où que j'aille, je vous conjure de ne pas me suivre, aett-vater, c'est trop risqué. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar gülümsüyor ancak bu gülümseme ölü bir adamın yüzüne ait gibi.{/n} "Gidebileceğim kadar uzağa gideceğim. En karanlık derinliklere dalacağım, bizzat kötülüğün inine gireceğim, sonra da... Avım orada sona erecek ve içimdeki hayvanın avı başlayacak. Arkamdan gelme Aett-Vater. Riske girme."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles, but it is a smile that belongs on a dead man's skull.{/n} "I will go as far as I can. Plunge into the darkest depths, into the lair of evil itself, and then... That is where my hunt will end so the hunt of the Beast can start. Do not follow me, Aett-Vater. Do not risk it."
